channel.title: Configuring Hammer for BMDM
channel.description:
I have made many many maps for mods, and this part is always the hardest lol. That is besides leaks and well hammer frustrations in general. Is there anybody that knows how to configure hammer for BMDM ? For some reason I think that it should run under sdk 2007 yet I find it impossible to get anything to load under 2007 and have had this problem before with another mod. Currently I am loading it under sdk 2009. In other words 2007 will not let me set anything up because it does not see any games that use it.
ahh i hope this helps lol basically the same thing here just change for black mesa as needed ... and btw i am the creator of Emp_slaughtered for this mod :stuck_out_tongue: [url]https://wiki.empiresmod.com/index.php?title=Configuring_Hammer_for_Empires[/url]
quick blurb to also help more.... easy fix try copping the gameconfig.txt file from C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\[your name]\sourcesdk\bin\source2009\bin to C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\[your name]\sourcesdk\bin\source2007\bin that let me access source sdk to set it up for black mesa [ also the (x86) is for 64bit os you might not have that

got it … for any one else who needs help i will gove you my config settings , but if you just congigure it normally to the 2007 source engine and like HELLION said above copy and paste the game config file from the sdk 2009 to the 2007 folder is should work

all fgd files from source mods bms

texture and map type are just half life 2

game exe sourcesdkbase2007

game directory sourcemods/bms

hammer vmf sourcemods/bms

under build programs

game exe sourcesdkbase2007\hl2exe

bsp exe sourcesdk\bin\source2007\vbsp.exe

vis sourcesdk\bin\source2007\vvis.exe

rad sourcesdk\bin\source2007\vrad.exe

compiled maps sourcemods\bms\maps

any questions feel free to ask
